name: Realm of the Dead
summary:
Realm of the Dead is a zombie-killing action game. 
A graphically superior third person adventure game with huge replay value 
3 hugely different characters each with their own unique combat styles. Unlock each characters special moves with skilled play 
More than 20 thrilling and immense levels to battle through against hoards of enemies 
Discover new armour and power-ups to help defeat the undead 
Each character can develop up to 11 different fight techniques through the game 
Hidden chambers and a great ranking system for massive replay value
